document.full_text: this week marks the beginning of lent, when many of us choose to abstain from meat or dairy products - making this the perfect time to try new vegan dishes, writes martha rose shulman in this week's recipes for health.
document.title: going vegan for lent
lines_and_colors: this week marks the beginning of lent, when many of us choose to abstain from meat or dairy products - making this the perfect time to try new vegan dishes, writes martha rose shulman in this week's recipes for health.
